{"id":1253129260,"question_id":3351,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"1Â month","timestamp":1715221659,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"34 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1253129260/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Maximize Happiness of Selected Children","memory":"61.5 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public long maximumHappinessSum(int[] h, int k) {\n        \n        Arrays.sort(h);\n        \n        int idx=h.length-1;\n        \n        int minus = 0;\n        long sum = 0;\n        while(k-->0){\n            \n            int val = h[idx--] - minus;\n            if(val<0) val=0;\n            \n            minus++;\n            sum+= val;\n        }\n        \n        return sum;\n        \n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"maximize-happiness-of-selected-children","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
